snippet.title: I Saw Black Clouds - Extended Trailer
snippet.description:
After the unexpected death of a close friend, Kristina returns to her hometown looking for answers, only to unearth a string of dark secrets. I Saw Black Clouds is an interactive psychological thriller with supernatural elements and branching storylines. Out now on PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch and Steam. Backward compatible with PS5 & Xbox Series X/S.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1346830
Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/p/i-saw-black-clouds/9pnb5czd8nvn
Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/i-saw-black-clouds-switch/
PS4: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP4459-CUSA26859_00-4774536450917461

Developed by: Ghost Dog Films
Published by: Wales Interactive

Follow Wales Interactive:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/WalesInter
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WalesInteractive
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/walesinteractive
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/WalesInteractive
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/walesinteractive
Wales Interactive: https://www.walesinteractive.com

#FMV #InteractiveMovie #Psychological
